Patterns: Can you please provide me with a {&} of the issue?

title.Validate: var result = new ValidateResult{ IsValid = true, Value = value}; var title = (value as string).Trim(); if (title.Length == 0) {result.Feedback = "Please provide a brief description of the issue."; result.IsValid = false; } return result;

description.Validate: var result = new ValidateResult{ IsValid = true, Value = value}; var description = (value as string).Trim(); if (description.Length == 0) {result.Feedback = "Please provide some more details:"; result.IsValid = false; } return result;

OnCompletion: await context.PostAsync("I am submitting your issue, and will confirm momentarily.");
